original_title: La noche de los sexos abiertos
overview: Moira, a beautiful cabaret dancer, is hired to impersonate another woman — who turns out to be a secret agent who must receive an important message that contains the hidden whereabouts of a very important character from World War II who once absconded with a vast fortune in gold.
tagline: A visually gorgeous film about very sordid happenings…
title: The Night Of Open Sex
